name: React Native Expo Boilerplate - Foundation
description: Create the foundational layer of a reusable React Native Expo boilerplate template with project initialization, folder structure, Expo Router navigation, NativeWind theming with dark mode, and base UI components.

userStories.title: Initialize Expo Project with TypeScript
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a properly configured Expo project with TypeScript so that I have a solid foundation to build upon.
acceptanceCriteria: Create new Expo project using `npx create-expo-app` with TypeScript template
Verify project runs with `npx expo start`

userStories.title: Establish Folder Structure
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a clear type-based folder structure so that code organization is consistent and scalable.
acceptanceCriteria: Create `/src` directory as the main source folder
Create `/src/repositories` for repository interfaces and implementations
Create `/src/constants` for app constants (colors, spacing, etc.)
Create `/src/assets` for images, fonts, and static assets
Add `index.ts` barrel exports in each directory

userStories.title: Configure Expo Router Navigation
userStories.description: As a developer, I want file-based routing with Expo Router so that navigation is intuitive and follows modern patterns.
acceptanceCriteria: Set up `/app` directory for route definitions
Configure typed routes for TypeScript support
Verify navigation works in Expo Go

userStories.title: Set Up NativeWind with Tailwind CSS
userStories.description: As a developer, I want NativeWind configured so that I can use Tailwind CSS classes for styling.
acceptanceCriteria: Install NativeWind and its dependencies (use stable version)
Add NativeWind types to TypeScript config
Verify Tailwind classes work on a test component

userStories.title: Implement Dark Mode Theming
userStories.description: As a user, I want the app to support dark mode with system preference detection and manual toggle so that I can use the app comfortably in any lighting.
acceptanceCriteria: Implement `useColorScheme` hook that detects system preference
Configure NativeWind for dark mode (`dark:` prefix classes)
System preference is respected when no manual override is set
Verify in Expo Go or simulator that the UI renders correctly

userStories.title: Create Base UI Components - Typography
userStories.description: As a developer, I want typography components so that text styling is consistent throughout the app.
acceptanceCriteria: Create `Text` component with variants (h1, h2, h3, body, caption, label)
Text component supports dark mode automatically
Text component accepts custom className for overrides
Verify in Expo Go or simulator that the UI renders correctly

userStories.title: Create Base UI Components - Button
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a Button component so that interactive elements are consistent.
acceptanceCriteria: Create `Button` component with variants (primary, secondary, outline, ghost)
Support disabled state with visual feedback
Verify in Expo Go or simulator that the UI renders correctly

userStories.title: Create Base UI Components - Input
userStories.description: As a developer, I want an Input component so that form fields are consistent.
acceptanceCriteria: Support error state with error message display
Verify in Expo Go or simulator that the UI renders correctly

userStories.title: Create Base UI Components - Card
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a Card component so that content containers are consistent.
acceptanceCriteria: Create `Card` component with padding and border radius
Verify in Expo Go or simulator that the UI renders correctly

userStories.title: Create Base UI Components - Container
userStories.description: As a developer, I want layout components so that screen structure is consistent.
acceptanceCriteria: Verify in Expo Go or simulator that the UI renders correctly

userStories.title: Define Repository Pattern Interfaces
userStories.description: As a developer, I want repository interfaces defined so that backend implementations can be swapped easily.
acceptanceCriteria: Create `IAuthRepository` interface (signIn, signUp, signOut, getCurrentUser, resetPassword)

userStories.title: Set Up Zustand Store Foundation
userStories.description: As a developer, I want Zustand configured with a base store so that state management patterns are established.
acceptanceCriteria: Create `useThemeStore` for theme state (colorScheme, toggleTheme, setTheme)
Configure AsyncStorage persistence for theme store

userStories.title: Create Home Screen
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a working Home screen so that I can validate the foundation setup works correctly.
acceptanceCriteria: Display app title using Typography component
Include theme toggle Button that switches light/dark mode
Display current theme state in a Card component
Include sample Input field demonstrating the component
All components render correctly in both light and dark mode
Verify in Expo Go on iOS and Android
